description:
Ideal for weekends or when you are packing light, this duffel bag features side and front pockets as well as an adjustable & detachable shoulder strap. The small bag unzips to expand into a larger 32" bag.

  • Made of 600 denier polyester
  • Side and front pockets
  • Adjustable and detachable shoulder strap
  • Easy-glide wheels
  • Meets airline check-in restrictions
  • Dimensions: 32" x 12.6" x 13.8"
name: 32" Expandable Rolling Duffel Bag, Black
shelfDescription:
<li>Made of 600 denier polyester
<li>Side and front pockets
